title: What are games that has murder mystery content? - Quora

response.answer_text: Suburbia A simulation and baking Facebook Game with a murder mystery content. Your Uncle has vanished and left you a huge inheritance in a rich neighborhood. After years away, you’ve come back to Crystal Falls to receive the house and take over your family’s catering business – but there’s more than muffins on your menu! Sinister Secrets and delicious drama await as you try to rebuild an empire of tasty treats.. and avoid disappearing along with your uncle! Can you solve the mysteries of Crystal Falls AND bake your way to the top? Game link   Desperate Housewives The Game Based from the hit series Desperate Housewives  Game Link

One board game is Clue, where you get to play the detective. There’s also, if you play Minecraft, a murder mystery game. It’s on the Hypixel server, and quite fun. There’s a murderer, detective, and innocents. The detective has to catch the murderer before the murderer kills all of the innocent people.
